trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle é usado como um contêiner para outros controles, especialmente quando os controles são gerados por meio de programação.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed, and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação de código-fonte que descreve o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controles em um designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property gets the caption that appears on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> propriedade obtém a legenda exibida no associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property gets the styles of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> propriedade obtém os estilos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method sets collection elements to the string representations of various style attributes of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método define elementos da coleção de representações de cadeia de caracteres de vários atributos de estilo do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência e comportamento de controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyPanelContainer` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyPanelContainer` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyPanelContainerDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyPanelContainerDesigner` on the `MyPanelContainer` class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyPanelContainerDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe e aplica um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> atributo para o `MyPanelContainerDesigner` no `MyPanelContainer` classe.

trans-unit.source: The `MyPanelContainerDesigner` overrides the following <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> members:
trans-unit.target: O `MyPanelContainerDesigner` substitui o seguinte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> membros:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property to define a design-time border style for the `MyPanelContainer` control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> propriedade para definir um estilo de borda de tempo de design para o `MyPanelContainer` controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property to provide a default caption for the `MyPanelContainer` control, if none was defined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> propriedade para fornecer uma legenda padrão para o `MyPanelContainer` controlar, se nenhum tiver sido definida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception, if the associated control is not a `MyPanelContainer` object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> método para lançar uma <xref:System.ArgumentException> exceção, se o controle associado não é um `MyPanelContainer` objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: A collection of style attributes implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de atributos de estilo implementando <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds string representations of style attributes to a collection to be used in the design-time rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona as representações de cadeia de caracteres de atributos de estilo para uma coleção a ser usada no processamento de tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base method, which adds string representations of style attributes to the `styleAttributes` collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base do método, que adiciona representações de cadeia de caracteres de atributos de estilo para o `styleAttributes` coleção.

trans-unit.source: These attributes are based on the style properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Esses atributos são com base nas propriedades de estilo de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> sets the direction of `styleAttribute` to a code indicating left-to-right or right-to-left, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> define a direção do `styleAttribute` para um código que indica a esquerda para a direita ou da direita para esquerda, com base no valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> propriedade do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption that appears on the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a legenda exibida no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the panel caption.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a legenda do painel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> propriedade retorna o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A> propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> propriedade em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> classe em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example provides a default caption for the associated control, if none was defined.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo fornece uma legenda padrão para o controle associado, se nenhum tiver sido definida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the styles of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os estilos do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that contains the design-time styles for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objeto que contém os estilos de tempo de design para o associado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property is an empty string (""), the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property returns an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> propriedade é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> propriedade retorna vazio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property returns a default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> propriedade retorna um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objeto que é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> propriedade em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> classe em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example defines a design-time border style for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define um estilo de borda de tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O visual designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e os eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> classe para alterar o comportamento de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> classe em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception, if the associated control is not a `MyPanelContainer` object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo gera um <xref:System.ArgumentException> exceção, se o controle associado não é um `MyPanelContainer` objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> or of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> ou de uma classe derivada de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado ao designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle não afeta qualquer persistência para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" /> ou para determinar seu valor com base em se o controle está marcado com um nível de classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> atributo.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> não for substituído, o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> controle ignorará o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> atributo.
